ygData.subject: RE: The server is not responding...!
ygData.msgSnippet: Thou I m not Michael Jackson, I would love to sing this song with you... You are not alone, I will stay with you, thou  you far away, both of us
ygData.messageBody:
Thou I'm not Michael Jackson, I would love to sing this song with you...
"You are not alone, I will stay with you, thou' you far away, both of us
linkdead...." ;)

I got more than 5 times LD yesterday too, so often that I give up playing
in the end. That's excluding 2 times line disconnection, sigh.

Ziltus (just drop lvl after KOS in Halas)

On Monday, 13 September, 1999 4:22 PM, Terence Tan Kar Chuan
[SMTP:karchuan@...] wrote:
> Hi, Terence here. This is my second post so please pardon my sudden
intrusion.
>
> Since the last update, I have been getting disconnected from the server 7
or 8 times in an hour. Verant says that it might be the Snet (I think it is
an ISP in US) and its routers problem. Does our ISPs (SingNET, Pacific NET
and Cyberway) use their routers? I am using Cyberway i.infinity plan btw.
>
> Any Cyberway subscribers having the same problem when playing EQ?
> << File: ATT00001.html >>
